metadata.synopsis: A one-time line triggered when a goblin guard spots the dead scrying eye.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Kill the scrying eye in the goblin camp and wait for a goblin to spot it.

0.speaker: Dror Ragzlin, Erna, GROUP_Goblins, Nightwarden Minthara, Yerle
0.text: 'S dead. Spied one too many bowels movin', I expect.
0.context: NodeContext: Satisfied contempt - the goblins hated this creepy thing and are glad it's dead
